variants.text: In return for your support, we would list you as one of our official connectors on our event page. Special supporters who frequently like and share our posts about the {{event_name}} will be featured on a physical banner at the event in {{event_location}}.

variants.text: We'll recognize your support by listing {{organization_name}} as an official community partner on our event page and social media.
Active supporters will be featured on our event materials and a physical banner at the venue in {{event_location}}, giving you visibility in front of key ecosystem players.
If interested, you can use our press kit with logos, example posts, and visuals - all ready to go, just plug & play! Simply follow the link: {{press_kit_url}}
